    xmlStreamReader.setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/nonvalidating/load-dtd-grammar", false);
    xmlStreamReader.setFeature("http://xml.org/sax/features/external-general-entities", false);

    xmlStreamReader.setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/nonvalidating/load-dtd-grammar", false);
    return xmlStreamReader;
